mapper.insert: insert into newlyopened (cardnumber, age, dateofbirth, sex, idcard, newlyopenedtype, address, detailedaddress, medicaladvice, diagnosis, additionalfeesid, projectid) values (#{cardnumber},#{age},#{dateofbirth},#{sex},#{idcard}.#{newlyopenedtype}, #{address},#{detailedaddress},#{medicaladvice},#{diagnosis},#{additionalfeesid} ,#{projectid})
